title: Beautiful Dead Bella
description: Lana Cloud has a fascination with food, full moons, and murder. When high-class herbalist Bella Reinig winds up dead, Lana insists she’s the perfect person to crack the case. She enlists the help of her two best friends Clancy Adams and Johnny Schoonover to help her find the murderer of beautiful Bella. Not one to shy away from confrontation, Lana’s shenanigans cause uproarious ado about everything as she involves a slew of props and people to accomplish the task of solving the murder. In her hilarious quest to find Bella’s murderer, she ends up battling with mob man Raff, uncovering a drug ring, finding tens of thousands of dollars in embezzled money, breaking up a prostitution ring, involving her father in a kidnapping, putting the life of her best friend in the world, Clancy, on the line, and causing chaos with every step taken to solve the murder. She further discovers that friendship is the greatest and most important treasure in the world when she risks her own life to save that of her best friend Clancy.
author: Margaux Sky
